casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Daniel Lynn Bowlin No. 99P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, For Bowlin, Daniel Lynn. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina. James R. Glover, Attorney at Law.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of March 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
